title: Rosena Allin-Khan – 2022 Comments on the Language Used by Suella Braverman
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rosena Allin-Khan, the Labour MP for Tooting, on 1 November 2022.
content: Braverman’s language in Parliament yesterday was appalling, but the Tories only know how to stoke hatred.
It’s about time we had a Government which shows decency and respect.
